attributes.action: Stop the EBacc (and Michael Gove) from ruining our education system
attributes.additional_details:
Not enough subjects covered - what about vocational qualifications?

What about Arts and Humanities?  These are not even included in the EBacc, but they are in other European Baccalaureates.

Too much emphasis on a memory based exam.

Michael Gove: please don't do this, please talk to teachers and find out what our learning children need to succeed - it is certainly not the EBacc in its current form!!
